import React from 'react' import { useNavigate ,} from 'react-router-dom' import { Api } from '../API/Api' import { endPoints } from '../API/Endpoint' import My_Profile_Action from '../Store/Action/My_Profile_Action' const ChangePassword = () => { const navigate = useNavigate() const changePasscode = (e) => { e.preventDefault() const reqpayload = { confirmPassword: e.target.confirmpassword.value, currentPassword: e.target.currpassword.value, newPassword: e.target.newpassword.value } Api.post(endPoints.UPDATE_USER_DETAIL, reqpayload) .then((res) => { if (res.data) { navigate("/profile") } }) .catch((err) => { console.log(err) }) } return ( <>

) } export default ChangePassword
